it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal
Class CardExpand

java.lang.Object
  it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal.base.BaseCard
      it.gmariotti.cardslib.library.internal.CardExpand
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardUIInferface
Direct Known Subclasses:
CustomExpander, ScoutExpander, ScoutExpanderTransList
public class CardExpand
extends BaseCard

Card Expand model.

You can customize this component. See https://github.com/gabrielemariotti/cardslib/tree/master/doc/EXPAND.md for more information.

You can easily extend and customize this class providing your inner layout and setting your values with setupInnerViewElements(android.view.ViewGroup, android.view.View) method.

Usege example: 
 
  //This provide a simple (and useless) expand area
   CardExpand expand = new CardExpand(getContext());

  //Set inner title in Expand Area
  expand.setTitle(getString(R.string.demo_expand_basetitle));

  //Add expand to card
  card.addCardExpand(expand);

Custom example: 
 
 public class CustomExpandCard extends CardExpand {


    public CustomExpandCard(Context context) {
       super(context, R.layout.carddemo_standard_inner_expand);
    }

    public void setupInnerViewElements(ViewGroup parent, View view) {

         if (view == null) return;

         //Retrieve TextView elements
         TextView tx1 = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.carddemo_expand_text1);
         TextView tx2 = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.carddemo_expand_text2);
         TextView tx3 = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.carddemo_expand_text3);
         TextView tx4 = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.carddemo_expand_text4);

         //Set value in text views
         if (tx1 != null) {
           tx1.setText(getContext().getString(R.string.demo_expand_customtitle1));
         }
    }
}
See this page for more information https://github.com/gabrielemariotti/cardslib/tree/master/EXPAND.md

Method Detail

getInnerView

public android.view.View getInnerView(android.content.Context context,
                                      android.view.ViewGroup parent)
Inflates the inner layout and adds to parent layout. Then calls setupInnerViewElements(android.view.ViewGroup, android.view.View) method to setup all values.

Specified by:
getInnerView in interface CardUIInferface
Overrides:
getInnerView in class BaseCard
Parameters:
context - context
parent - Inner Frame
Returns:

setupInnerViewElements

public void setupInnerViewElements(android.view.ViewGroup parent,
                                   android.view.View view)
This method sets values to expand elements and customizes view. Override this method to customize your Expand View

Parameters:
parent - Expand external Layout
view - inner-expand view
